actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to promote the greater use of recycled and recyclable paper by mailers of third-class mail matter, including franked mailings by Members of Congress.

summary.text: Directs the General Accounting Office to study and report to the Congress on ways to encourage the greater use of recycled paper by: (1) mailers of third-class mail matters; and (2) Members of Congress for franked mail.

titles.title: A bill to promote the greater use of recycled and recyclable paper by mailers of third-class mail matter, including franked mailings by Members of Congress.
